text: Romagna Handball is a men's handball club from Imola and Mordano, Italy, that plays in the Serie A. The club was born in 2001, from the fusion of H.C. Imola 1973 and U.S. Mordano 1978. ==European record == {| class="wikitable" ! Season ! Competition ! Round ! Club ! 1st leg ! 2nd leg !
